subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Single Persons
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Oregon’s Chip Kelly and Wisconsin’s Bret Bielema, both single, illustrate the subtle shift away from a longtime unspoken requirement for head football coaches.
snippet: Oregon’s Chip Kelly and Wisconsin’s Bret Bielema, both single, illustrate the subtle shift away from a longtime unspoken requirement for head football coaches.
